snippet: Supreme Court justices on Monday tried to find the right balance between the reputation of an Air Wisconsin pilot and a manager’s concern for air safety.
abstract: Supreme Court attempts to find right balance between air safety and a pilot's reputation in case of William L Hoeper, pilot who alleges he was treated unfairly when Air Wisconsin Airlines fired him amid accusations that he was mentally unstable.
lead_paragraph: Supreme Court justices on Monday tried to find the right balance between the reputation of an Air Wisconsin pilot and a manager’s concern for air safety.

headline.main: High Court Weighs Air Safety vs. Pilot’s Reputation
headline.print_headline: Court Weighs Safety and Pilot’s Reputation
